title: Judge orders North Carolina to certify Democrat winner of court election
shortDescription: Chief U.S. District Judge Richard Myers in Raleigh sided with Justice Allison Riggs ordering N.C.'s election board to not throw out any ballots.

title: White House removes NTSB vice chair
shortDescription: The White House removed the vice chair of the National Transportation Safety Board, the latest in a series of dismissals by Trump.

title: Trump hosts $1.5M fundraising dinner with crypto czar
shortDescription: President Donald Trump hosted a $1.5 million-per-plate fundraising dinner at the Trump National Golf Club in Sterling, Virginia.

title: Live: Trump hosts Canada PM; Noem says president ready to nix FEMA
shortDescription: Lawmakers begin scrutinizing Trump's budget focusing on border security and tariffs, while Trump meets with Canada's Prime Minister Mark Carney.

title: Alcatraz visitors react to Trump: From 'moron' to 'idea seems good'
shortDescription: Nearly all interviewed agreed it would be very expensive to restore the historic facility on an island in San Francisco Bay.

title: Germany's Merz fails to be elected chancellor in shock first-round vote
shortDescription: German conservative leader Friedrich Merz failed to secure enough parliamentary votes to become chancellor in a major blow.

title: Social Security wait times have grown under Trump. Here's why.
shortDescription: Hold times at Social Security's 1-800 number averaged 60 minutes last year, during the Biden admin. Under Trump, they top 90 mins.

title: Trump's $1.5 million-a-plate dinner with 'crypto czar' sparks concerns
shortDescription: The purpose of the fundraiser was unclear as the Constitution’s 22nd Amendment bars Trump from seeking a third term.

title: Appeals court rejects Trump bid to revoke 400,000 migrants' status
shortDescription: The Homeland Security Department had decided to end the two-year parole granted to thounds of Cubans, Haitians, Nicaraguans and Venezuelan migrants.

title: Trump halts this virus research funding for China after COVID-19
shortDescription: Trump halted research funding to China and Iran because of a suspicion that COVID-19 originated in a lab.

title: Trump admin cuts Harvard off from new federal research grants
shortDescription: The Education Department notified Harvard University on Monday that it would be ineligible for new federal research grants.

title: Trump announces DC as host of 2027 NFL Draft
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced the 2027 NFL Draft will be held in Washington, D.C., on the National Mall.

title: Trump says he knew 'nothing' about image on his account of him as pope
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he had nothing to do with artificially generated image of him dressed as the pope.

title: See inside Alcatraz as Trump calls to reopen prison
shortDescription: Trump has called for the reopening of Alcatraz, which was designated a museum and historic site after closing more than 60 years ago.

title: Proposal to axe Head Start excluded from Trump's budget
shortDescription: The White House reneged on a plan to zero out funding for Head Start, a preschool program relied on by hundreds of thousands of low-income families.

title: Trump admin offers $1,000 to migrants who self-deport using CBP One app
shortDescription: The move is the latest part of President Donald Trump’s effort to crack down on illegal immigration.

title: 19 states sue Trump administration for overhauling HHS, staff cuts
shortDescription: RFK Jr. announced a massive restructuring plan including the consolidation of divisions from 28 to 15 and elimination of 20,000 full-time employees

title: First it was dolls. Trump now says kids don't need '250 pencils.'
shortDescription: 'I don't think that a beautiful baby girl needs – that's 11 years old – needs to have 30 dolls,' Trump said, defending his tariffs. Also: five pencils are fine.

title: GOP Rep. Mike Lawler hosts rowdy town hall, police eject woman
shortDescription: New York Republican Mike Lawler faced a rowdy town hall on attendees broke out into boos and a constituent was forcibly removed by police.

title: Trump says 'I don't know' when asked if he must uphold Constitution
shortDescription: Plus: What activists say about Trump's first 100 days in office setting back civil rights protections. | New findings on the dangers of plastic.

title: President Trump floats reopening of Alcatraz
shortDescription: President Donald Trump floated the idea of reopening and expanding the infamous Alcatraz prison as he expressed frustration with judges.
